      • place

        public boolean place(int territory,
                     int troops)
        Parameters:
        territory - the territory to place troops on
        troops - the number of troops to place on the territory
        Returns:

      • attack

        public boolean attack(int attackTerritory,
                      int attackTroops,
                      int defendTerritory,
                      int defendTroops)
        Parameters:
        attackTerritory - the territory that troops are attacking from
        attackTroops - the number of troops of the attackingTerritory that are attacking the defendingTerritory
        defendTerritory - the territory that troops are defending
        defendTroops - the number of troops in the defendingTerritory that are defending from the attackingTerritory
        Returns:
        true if the attack was successful, false otherwise

      • move

        public boolean move(int moveFromTerritory,
                    int moveToTerritory,
                    int troops)
        Parameters:
        moveFromTerritory - the territory to move troops from
        moveToTerritory - the territory to move troops to
        troops - the number of troops to move from moveFromTerritory to moveToTerritory
        Returns:
        true if the move was successful, false otherwise

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin()
        Returns:
        true if there is any player among the list of players who has exceeded the win condition, false otherwise

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin(int playerID)
        Parameters:
        playerID - the player to check if they have won
        Returns:
        true if the player with the playerID has won, false otherwise

      • getOwnedTerritories

        public Territory[] getOwnedTerritories(int playerID)
        Parameters:
        playerID - the id of the player whose controlled territories are requested
        Returns:
        the owned territories of the player with the associated playerID if valid, null otherwise

      • getAdjacentNonOwnedTerritories

        public Territory[] getAdjacentNonOwnedTerritories(int territory)
        Parameters:
        territory - the id of the territory to find non-owned adjacent territories
        Returns:
        an array of non-owned adjacent territories if valid territory id, null otherwise

      • getAdjacentOwnedTerritories

        Parameters:

        Returns:
